name: Warden of Wetcheypalie
description:
To play, click on this link:

https://douillet.github.io/platformer-main/

Story

    In the green countries of Wetcheypalie, the war with the neighbouring kingdom  is finally finished. After two years of conflict, Andras, a haughty armored knight who was called by his king to the war, can go back to his castle and meet again his spouse, Timéa. But, Andras is the only fighter to come back to the castle. 

     He quickly discovers that the Gnobblars led by the Fattish King Kam’Zoul plunder his domain and kidnap his wife. Andras takes up arms again, ignorant the demands of help of his peasants. He will quickly understand that he needs the assistance of his subjects to get rid of the Forest’s Gnobblars and get back his spouse.

    In this first level, you start your journey at the castle of Andras, who is burning and deserted. You will find the first Gnobblars, little gobelins of soils colors. Andras in his armor and with his sword, the Messer, can easily defeat them one by one. Exit the castle to chase the Gnobblars in the dark forests and travel the wood bridge. You will quickly find the big cave which is the closest den of these dwarves. And certainly, Andras will get some responses... 

How to play

Use the arrows of your keyboard Left/Right to walk and the upper arrow to jump. To use your sword and fight, press shift. If you are on mobile, use the buttons shown on the screen.

    You can kill all the enemies by jumping on their head and hitting them with a sword attack. But if they touch you, you lose and restart at the precedent checkpoint. The goal is easy: go to the end of the level and dodge the obstacles.

    Recommended to have at least 7 years old but you can play at all ages. 

Trailer music:

Land Of Pirates by Alexander Nakarada

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4961-land-o...
